text:
The #COVID19 Dashboard has been updated: https://t.co/XhspoyTG79

On Friday 26 March, 6,187 new cases and 70 deaths within 28 days of a positive test were reported across the UK.

29,316,130 people have received the 1st dose of a #vaccine, and 3,009,863 have received a 2nd dose. https://t.co/k4knejUV5M
